languages.text: "Есть один капитан, хранящий уникальный протокол как семейную реликвию и отказавшийся продавать ее мне. Корабль, принадлежащий ему, назывался "Падение Ренегатов". Возможно, вы сможете найти путь к сокровищам этого гордеца... Я отправлю вам координаты места, где мы встречались последний раз".

"There is a certain captain who owns a unique protocol, a family heirloom, which he has refused to sell to me. His ship is called the Renegades' Fall. Perhaps you can chart a path to his hoarded treasure... I will send you the coordinates of the place where we last met."
languages.original_text: "Есть один капитан, хранящий уникальный протокол как семейную реликвию и отказавшийся продавать ее мне. Корабль, принадлежащий ему, назывался "Падение Ренегатов". Возможно, вы сможете найти путь к сокровищам этого гордеца... Я отправлю вам координаты места, где мы встречались последний раз".

traits.locale_text: "There is a captain who owns a unique protocol as family heirloom, and has refused to sell it to me. He owned a ship called the Renegades' Fall. Perhaps you can chart a path to that proud man's treasure... I will send you the coordinates of the place where we last met."

"There is a captain who owns a unique protocol as family heirloom, and has refused to sell it to me. He owned a ship called the Renegades' Fall. Perhaps you can chart a path to that proud man's treasure... I will send you the coordinates of the place where we last met."

"There is a certain captain who owns a unique protocol, a family heirloom, which he has refused to sell to me. His ship is called the Renegades' Fall. Perhaps you can chart a path to his hoarded treasure... I will send you the coordinates of the place where we last met."

"There is a certain captain who owns a unique protocol, a family heirloom, which he has refused to sell to me. His ship is called the Renegades' Fall. Perhaps you can chart a path to his hoarded treasure... I will send you the coordinates of the place where we last met."

"There is a certain captain who owns a unique protocol, a family heirloom, which he has refused to sell to me. His ship is called the Renegades' Fall. Perhaps you can chart a path to his hoarded treasure... I will send you the coordinates of the place where we last met."

"There is a certain captain who owns a unique protocol, a family heirloom, which he has refused to sell to me. His ship is called the Renegades' Fall. Perhaps you can chart a path to his hoarded treasure... I will send you the coordinates of the place where we last met."

languages.text: "Es gibt da einen Captain, der ein einzigartiges Protokoll besaß, eine Familienerbstück, das er mir nicht verkaufen wollte. Sein Schiff heißt Renegades' Fall. Vielleicht findet Ihr einen Weg zu seinem versteckten Schatz ... Ich sende Euch die Koordinaten des Ortes, wo wir uns zum letzten Mal getroffen haben."
languages.original_text: "There is a certain captain who owns a unique protocol, a family heirloom, which he has refused to sell to me. His ship is called the Renegades' Fall. Perhaps you can chart a path to his hoarded treasure... I will send you the coordinates of the place where we last met."

traits.locale_text: "Es gibt da einen Captain, der ein einzigartiges Protokoll besaß, eine Familienerbstück, das er mir nicht verkaufen wollte. Sein Schiff heißt Renegades' Fall. Vielleicht findet Ihr einen Weg zu seinem versteckten Schatz ... Ich sende Euch die Koordinaten des Ortes, wo wir uns zum letzten Mal getroffen haben."

languages.text: « Un certain capitaine possède un protocole unique. Une relique familiale qu'il a refusé de me vendre. Son vaisseau s'appelle la Chute des Renégats. Vous pourrez peut-être établir une trajectoire jusqu'à son trésor... Je vous indiquerai l'emplacement où je l'ai vu pour la dernière fois. »
languages.original_text: "There is a certain captain who owns a unique protocol, a family heirloom, which he has refused to sell to me. His ship is called the Renegades' Fall. Perhaps you can chart a path to his hoarded treasure... I will send you the coordinates of the place where we last met."

traits.locale_text: « Un certain capitaine possède un protocole unique. Une relique familiale qu'il a refusé de me vendre. Son vaisseau s'appelle la Chute des Renégats. Vous pourrez peut-être établir une trajectoire jusqu'à son trésor... Je vous indiquerai l'emplacement où je l'ai vu pour la dernière fois. »

languages.text: “我知道某个舰长有一份独一无二的协议，那是他的传家宝，他不肯卖给我。他的船叫做‘叛党之殒号’，或许您能得到他珍藏的宝贝吧……我可以把我们上次见面区域的坐标发给您。”
languages.original_text: "There is a certain captain who owns a unique protocol, a family heirloom, which he has refused to sell to me. His ship is called the Renegades' Fall. Perhaps you can chart a path to his hoarded treasure... I will send you the coordinates of the place where we last met."

traits.locale_text: “我知道某个舰长有一份独一无二的协议，那是他的传家宝，他不肯卖给我。他的船叫做‘叛党之殒号’，或许您能得到他珍藏的宝贝吧……我可以把我们上次见面区域的坐标发给您。”

languages.text: «Cierto capitán posee un protocolo único; una reliquia familiar que se ha negado a venderme. Su nave se llama Caída de los Renegados. Tal vez pueda encontrar el camino a su tesoro... Le enviaré las coordenadas del lugar donde lo vi por última vez».
languages.original_text: "There is a certain captain who owns a unique protocol, a family heirloom, which he has refused to sell to me. His ship is called the Renegades' Fall. Perhaps you can chart a path to his hoarded treasure... I will send you the coordinates of the place where we last met."

traits.locale_text: «Cierto capitán posee un protocolo único; una reliquia familiar que se ha negado a venderme. Su nave se llama Caída de los Renegados. Tal vez pueda encontrar el camino a su tesoro... Le enviaré las coordenadas del lugar donde lo vi por última vez».

languages.text: 「ある船長が、とても珍しいプロトコル、先祖代々受け継がれてきた家宝を所有しているのです。ですが、私がそれを買いたいと言っても、彼は頑として売ろうとしません。彼の船の名前は『レネゲイズ・フォール』といいます。あなたなら、彼の隠された財宝への道を見つけられるかもしれません…最後に彼と会った場所の座標を送ります」
languages.original_text: "There is a certain captain who owns a unique protocol, a family heirloom, which he has refused to sell to me. His ship is called the Renegades' Fall. Perhaps you can chart a path to his hoarded treasure... I will send you the coordinates of the place where we last met."

traits.locale_text: 「ある船長が、とても珍しいプロトコル、先祖代々受け継がれてきた家宝を所有しているのです。ですが、私がそれを買いたいと言っても、彼は頑として売ろうとしません。彼の船の名前は『レネゲイズ・フォール』といいます。あなたなら、彼の隠された財宝への道を見つけられるかもしれません…最後に彼と会った場所の座標を送ります」

languages.text: "Benzersiz bir protokole sahip bir kaptan var. Bu, ailesinin yadigârı. Satmayı reddetti. Gemisinin adı 'Hainlerin Bozgunu'. Belki hazinesine giden yolu siz çizebilirsiniz. Son görüştüğümüz yerin koordinatlarını size ileteceğim."
languages.original_text: "There is a certain captain who owns a unique protocol, a family heirloom, which he has refused to sell to me. His ship is called the Renegades' Fall. Perhaps you can chart a path to his hoarded treasure... I will send you the coordinates of the place where we last met."

traits.locale_text: "Benzersiz bir protokole sahip bir kaptan var. Bu, ailesinin yadigârı. Satmayı reddetti. Gemisinin adı 'Hainlerin Bozgunu'. Belki hazinesine giden yolu siz çizebilirsiniz. Son görüştüğümüz yerin koordinatlarını size ileteceğim."
